banner.frozenCannotModify: This structure is frozen and cannot be modified.
banner.nothingRunning: Nothing is running. No data is updating.
banner.readOnlyView: This is a read-only view of a structural declaration.

company.frozenStructureIdentity: Frozen company structure identity and metadata
company.frozenStructuralDeclaration: This is a frozen structural declaration. It cannot be modified. To make changes, create a new Draft in Design-Time.

structure.title: Structure View
structure.frozenDeclarations: These are frozen responsibility declarations. Cells do not execute or run.
structure.noCells: No cells defined in this frozen structure.
structure.cellIsDeclaration: Cell is a frozen responsibility declaration. It is not an executor and does not run.
structure.noRoleConstraints: No role constraints attached to this cell.
structure.roleIsConstraint: Role is a frozen constraint condition attached to this Cell. It is not an independent entity.
structure.selectCell: Select a cell to view details

topology.title: Topology View
topology.frozenDeclarativeTopology: This is a frozen declarative topology. Relationships represent structural dependencies, not execution order. Nothing is running.
topology.noRelationships: No relationships defined in this frozen structure.
topology.declarativeTopologyView: This is a declarative topology view.
topology.relationshipsStructuralDependencies: Relationships represent structural dependencies, not execution order or runtime flow.
topology.dependencyDescription: Cell A depends on Cell B existing
topology.referenceDescription: Cell A references Cell B output
topology.inputOutputDescription: Cell A output is Cell B input

methodology.title: Methodology Context
methodology.description: Methodology perspective active at freeze time
methodology.noMethodology: No methodology was specified when this structure was frozen.
methodology.methodologyPerspective: This is the methodology perspective that was active when frozen. It is read-only and cannot be changed.
methodology.methodologyPerspectiveFrozen: This is the methodology perspective that was active when this structure was frozen. It is read-only and cannot be changed.

freezeRecord.title: Freeze Record
freezeRecord.description: Immutable record of the freeze operation
freezeRecord.immutableRecord: This freeze record is immutable. The structure cannot be unfrozen or modified.
freezeRecord.frozenAtDescription: This timestamp is static and represents the moment of freeze. It does not indicate any change or activity.
freezeRecord.immutableStatement: This freeze record is immutable. The structure cannot be unfrozen or modified. To make changes, create a new Draft in Design-Time.

errors.snapshotDoesNotConform: This snapshot does not conform to Authority Layer schemas and cannot be displayed.
